bibl.title: Marie Le Fevre, Yvonne Le Fevre, & Georgette Normand v. M. Angelique. Writ of Habeas Corpus
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

person.persName: Marie Le Fevre, Yvonne Le Fevre, & Georgette Normand

div1.p: In the Circuit Court of the United States for District of Washington Northern Division
United States of America, District of Washington} ss.

I, A.REEVES AYRES, Clerk of the Circuit of the United States for the District of Washington, fo herby certify the foregoing twenty-four (24) typewritten pages, numbered from 1 to 24, inclusive, to be dull, true and correct copies of all the papers, records and proceedings in the above entitled matters, as such papers, records and proceedings are now on file and of record in my office at Seattle in the Northern Division of the District of Washington; and that the same constiture the record of appeal in this cause, on behalf of the Appellants above named,f rom the Circuit Court of the United States from the District of Washington, to the United States Circuit Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit.
I further certify that I have hereto annexed, and herewith transmit, the original citation issued in said cause.

I further certify that the cost of preparating and certifying said record on appeal is the sum of $9.95, and that a charge for sad sum will be included in the account presented by me against the Goverment of the United States for services preformed during the quarter ending March 31, 1903.
In Witness Whereof I have hereunto s et my hand and affixed the seal of said Circuit court, this March 12th, 1903.
A. REEVES AYRES, Clerk, By Deputy Clerk.
